title: Account Signup
body: Users can create an account using email and password. Password must be at least 6 characters.

title: Login Issues
body: If a user forgets their password, they can reset it using the 'Forgot Password' option on the login page. A reset link will be sent to the registered email address.

title: Billing Cycle
body: Billing is monthly. Payments are charged automatically at the start of each billing period.

title: Payment Processing
body: All subscription payments are processed automatically at the beginning of each monthly billing cycle.

title: Failed Payments
body: If a payment fails, the system will retry automatically within 24 hours. Users will receive an email notification if the payment cannot be processed.

title: Refund Policy
body: Refunds are only available within the first 7 days of the billing cycle. After this period, charges are non-refundable.

title: Subscription Plans
body: The platform offers Free, Pro, and Enterprise plans. Each plan differs in usage limits, response speed, and feature availability.

title: Upgrading a Plan
body: Users can upgrade their subscription plan at any time. The new plan will take effect immediately, and the price difference will be prorated.

title: Usage Limits
body: Each subscription plan has a monthly usage limit. Once the limit is reached, users must wait until the next billing cycle or upgrade their plan.

title: Customer Support
body: Customer support is available via email during business hours. Enterprise users receive priority support with faster response times.

title: Data Privacy
body: User data is encrypted at rest and in transit. We do not share personal information with third parties without user consent.
